Implement the following design in React. Use the following files generated from a Figma design as a specification and guide:

```src/styles/Frame_81.module.css
.Frame_81_192_57 {
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 11px;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
}
.NaturalResultsFullerHairlinesConfidentPatients_192_58 {
  color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
  letter-spacing: -0.45px;
  width: 430px;
  font-family: Test Söhne;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 140%;
  display: inline-block;
}
.SoCalAdvancedHairRestoration_192_59 {
  color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 0 4px 10.9px #a87b2329;
  letter-spacing: -0.48px;
  text-transform: capitalize;
  backdrop-filter: blur(49.9px);
  width: 388px;
  font-family: Test Söhne;
  font-size: 48px;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 50px;
  display: inline-block;
}
.Group_48_192_60 {
  backdrop-filter: blur(73.85px);
  width: 180px;
  height: 62px;
}

```

---
